body.name: Hanes Women's Organic Cotton Panties Pack, ComfortSoft Underwear, 6-Pack (Colors May Vary)
features: GO ORGANIC - Organic cotton underwear briefs are made with 40% less dyes, something to feel good about.
COMFORT AT THE WAIST - A ComfortSoft waistband is kind to your skin and moves without pinching or binding.
A SLEEK, SMOOTH SILO - A high-rise waist and full-coverage front and back give you the smoothness you want under clothes.
NO-RIDE, NO-WORRY LEG BANDS - Dreamy comfort at the leg openings makes these women’s briefs a breeze to wear.
BYE, BYE TAG - No scratchy tag to bunch up or itch in tagless women’s briefs that are made for comfort.
STOCK-UP 6-PACK - Replenish your undie drawer in an instant with a convenient pack of six women's panties.
body.description: If you care about the fabric you wear and love the modern hipster silhouette, Hanes® has the panties for you. These organic cotton hipster panties are made with 40% less dyes than traditional cotton so you can feel good about wearing them. You'll love that these smoothing cotton hipsters have a ComfortSoft® cotton-covered waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a hybrid with the low-rise waist of a bikini and the moderate back coverage of a brief, plus wider sides that sit at the hips. This lightweight underwear is wonderfully soft against your skin and super comfortable with leg bands that stay in place without riding up. Even better, they are tag-free for itch-free comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,160 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #35 in Women's Briefs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us HanesBrands makes everyday apparel that is known and loved by consumers around the world for comfort, quality and value. Among the company’s iconic brands are Hanes, the basic apparel brand in the United States; Champion, an innovator at the intersection of lifestyle and athletic apparel; and Bonds, which is setting new standards for design and sustainability. We are committed to making the world a more comfortable, livable place. We have established new, wide-ranging global goals and designed to increase our transparency on key metrics. We approach sustainability from a broad, holistic perspective and focus our efforts in all areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They run big.
reviews.reviewText: 100% cotton, comfortable, run a little big but I like the way they fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these!
reviews.reviewText: I really like these panties because the waist bands are awesome! The elastic in wrapped in material and is the band is comfortable and doesn't unravel. The material is thick and soft and the best panties I have had ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and fit
reviews.reviewText: I listened to the reviews and I went a size up and they looked huge I got a size 8 so I went one size up to the eight well I thought I'm going to have to return these and then I washed them well they shrink down to a size 7 and they fit me perfectly they're very comfortable they don't feel like you have any panties on at all I mean you can tell you have something there but I mean they don't rub or you can't feel the seams and the a the waist or the leg holes rubbing. I ordered some of the classic cotton ones I think they're going to go right back and I'm going to order myself some more of these because the One reviewer was right it does feel like you're wearing nothing! Just get a size up because they shrink down a whole size. Otherwise they're fantastic nicest most comfortable panties I've ever worn! The fact that they're organic is even better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% Cotton, and absolutely comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitivities to synthetic fibers, so an all cotton garment is a necessity. These are very well made, and buttery soft! If you have sensory issues, these are the ones you need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I normally wear a size 6, but after reading suggestions to order a size larger I ordered size 7. They looked too big when I opened the package, but fit very well. So soft and love the waistband.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars THIS BRIEF IS A POSER: Not a good liner for pants/skirts/dresses.
reviews.reviewText: This style was advertised as briefs, but the cut is more like the hipster model. Waistband is clearly lower than a normal brief. It also tends to roll over on itself instead of staying in place. Organic cotton fabric is nice and soft, but odd style does not fit well. Price was good so I'll keep them, but won't re-order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great quality. They are not as stretchy as other Hanes panties but still comfy. The material is thick and I think will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I've previously purchased comfortsoft briefs by Hanes at Target and these are not the same. They are not stretchy at all, they shrink more after washing and drying, and the leg band elastic is barely covered with material. I will not be buying these on Amazon again.

This underwear is very comfortable. I am a thin and petite person and do not like my underwear to be too tight. The band is thicker and sits right in the middle of my belly button. The band does not irritate me. The cotton is on the thick side and is very soft. They wash and dry beautifully in the washer and dryer. They are well made and last a long time. They are good value for the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: nice colours...good quality cotton, but a bit small...
reviews.reviewText: if I ordered again, I would definitely size up...
Excelente llego antes de la fecha programada, bonitos colores, pedir una talla menor vienen un poco grandes, excelente calidad
I bought this as a gift for someone, who said that the quality was good. She said it was soft and comfortable.
